modName: The witchs house mod and tower
summary: This mod adds witch\\\\\\\'s house + tower near Falkreath.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://shrani.si/f/3D/x4/2pRRqWL4/skyrim.jpg[/img]
This mod adds witch\\\\\\\'s house + tower near Falkreath.

Requirements:
Latest Skyrim patch

DESCRIPTION
In this house are living not one but two evil witch twins. You have to kill them in order to get keys. Firist one is somewhere around the house and the second is in the basement guarding the prisoners(including Hansel and Gretel ;P) House by itself is small and has secret room through which you can get to the tower (because its locked from inside). In the tower is a lot of things (look the images :D) On ground floor is magic skull which opens tower doors and secret stone door which leads to basement. In basemnt as said is the second evil witch, kill it and retrieve the cage key and rescue Hansel,Gretel and others MUAHAAHA. In basement is even third witch sister, but she is NOT EVIL, so dont attack her, in the future update she could even join your advenures because you saved her from her evil sisters but in this version she prefer cage and not you :P. Thats the story :D
HOUSE-small, basic things, secret room, enchanter, alchemy table
TOWER-magic skull, alot of potions,scrolls,.., link between house and basement
BASEMENT-prison, evil and locked white witch, Hansel and Gretel

ENJOY AND IF YOUU LIKE IT  ENDORSE  :D

CREDITS
Mahmut987
LillithSuccubus (idea of doing that house) â€“thanks great idea :D
